lines.text: None of my memory banks have deleted information in the past 39 hours. A new record.
[Passing a prison]
Just think about all of those frighteningly dangerous criminals.
They're locked up. Usually, it's the ones that are free you have to worry about.

[to journal]
I try hard not to constantly be the first one to give the answer in class...
Thelma, you've got to have priorities.
All right. When shall I schedule them?
Harlan Band doesn't hate you, Radu. He's afraid of you.
Afraid?
Yes. Every time he looks at you, he's afraid that everything he knows is wrong. And so are you, every time you look at me.
Spung do not question Andromedans. Spung enslave Andromedans. Besides, Earthers are easier to interrogate.
Radu, raise the shields.
How do I do that?
I don't know.
Rosie gets a nice chat with her parents, and what do I get? A holo-recording of my dad saying, "Hi, we're off-world right now, we'll be back... whenever."
[About Catalina]
I keep warning her not to over do her sonic practicing. She'll blow a vocal chord or something.
yeah, well that's one of the dangers when you're hooked on sonics.
His temperature is thirty-five degrees Celsius. Low, even for Andromedans. Oh, and his barometric pressure is dropping. I think he's going to snow.
That's ridiculous.
[Radu sneezes, and snow flies out of his ears.]
